email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN WAVE available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Vessel details: DWT 75000, LOA 225m. Freight rate is $42/MT FOB. Laycan 25-30 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $38/MT? Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Michael Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. The laytime is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is $10,000/day. The best I can do is $40/MT. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

$40/MT and $10,000/day demurrage rate are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send the recap.

Best regards,
Michael Jones

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 75000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: $40/MT FOB
- Laycan: 25-30 October
- Demurrage: $10,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Correction: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Apologies, I noticed a typo in the laycan. The correct laycan is 26-31 October. Please update your records.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
